rescuecore2.standard.kernel.comms

Interface Noise

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChainedNoise, DropoutNoise, FailureNoise, StaticNoise

    public interface Noise
    Noise implementations mess with messages in some way.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AKSpeak applyNoise(AKSpeak message)
      Optionally apply some noise to a message and return either the original message or a replacement.

    • Method Detail

      • applyNoise

        AKSpeak applyNoise(AKSpeak message)
        Optionally apply some noise to a message and return either the original message or a replacement.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to tinker with.
        Returns:
        The original message or a replacement.
